item.title: test code highlighting
item.description: require(tidyverse) ## Loading required package: tidyverse ## -- Attaching packages -------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.0.0 v purrr 0.2.5 ## v tibble 1.4.2 v dplyr 0.7.4 ## v tidyr 0.8.0 v stringr 1.3.1 ## v readr 1.1.1 v forcats 0.3.0 ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.5.1 ## Warning: package 'purrr' was built under R version 3.5.1 ## -- Conflicts ----------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() data("cars") ggplot(cars, aes(speed, dist)) + geom_point()

item.title: Blog posts coming soon
item.description: A couple of blog posts related with my research and R coming soon, still very much a work in progress though…
